DOC.brief_summary: Effectiveness of lutein, zeaxanthin and trypan blue to stain the anterior lens capsule during cataract phacoemulsification.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Lutein, Zeaxanthine and Trypan Blue to Stain the Anterior Lens Capsule
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty patients with cataract (nuclear, entumecente, total) and indication for cataract surgery will be selected to participate in this study.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients over 50 years Diagnosis of cataract (nuclear, entumecente, total) Absence of red reflex Indication of cataract surgery Exclusion Criteria Posterior subcapsular cataract Any history of eye disease Glaucoma Eye infection affecting any structure prior ocular Any previous ocular surgery
